text: Converse is an American lifestyle brand known for sneakers, skating shoes, footwear, apparel, and accessories. The company was founded by Marquis Mills Converse, and headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts. The corporation is owned by Nike Inc. == References == Converse Oficial Global And Converse Latam (Latino American) Category:1900s establishments in Massachusetts Category:1908 establishments in the United States Category:American clothing companies Category:Shoe companies Category:Companies based in Boston
title: Converse
